item.description:
At the beginning of each meeting, we have a chance to get to know one another and our professional specialties. We share a potluck lunch, and then have a featured presenter share about his/her work.

Reducing Your Chemical Body Burden with Cheryl Rounds

Many of the products we use everyday, such as our body care products and cleaners contain chemicals that are hazardous to our health. We all carry a chemical body burden from years of exposure through everyday life. In this talk we will learn to identify toxic chemicals and properly decipher a label . This the first step to reducing our exposure. Because our government does not test for toxicity of chemicals (many of the chemicals in our products have been outlawed in Europe), we all need to learn to be choosy in the products we use and send the message to corporate America that we want safe products.
item.how_to_find_us: I will come to the door to welcome you!
item.name: November Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
